summary: A public housing tenement is plunged into a dark storm of supernatural chaos.
cast: Siu-Ho Chin|Kara Wai|Hee Ching Paw|Anthony Chan|Hoi-Pang Lo|Richard Ng|Fat Chung|Billy Lau|Morris Ho|Zip Ho|Oggy Ho|Bobo Tsang|Chun-Man Ko|Giselle Lam|Chak-Sun Lau|Kwok-Shing Fung|Aaron Lo|Wing-Fu Cheung|Yi-Yi Yang
title: Geung see
